name: Lars Hjortsberg
obverse: Bust of Lars Hjortsberg facing left.
reverse: A woman in classic clothing stands next to a grave placing a wreath on top of the grave. In her left hand is a comedy mask and a cane.
references: Kongl. Vitterhets, Historie och Antiquitets Academiens Handlingar p. 318 #9
description: Lars Hjortsberg (22 November 1772 – 8 July 1843) was a Swedish stage actor.
He has been referred to as the most famous Swedish actor of the first half of the 19th-century.
